com.github.jukkakarvanen.kafka.streams.test

Class TopologyTestDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.streams.TopologyTestDriver
      • com.github.jukkakarvanen.kafka.streams.test.TopologyTestDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class TopologyTestDriver
extends org.apache.kafka.streams.TopologyTestDriver
    Replacement class for org.apache.kafka.streams.TopologyTestDriver to use TestInputTopic and TestInputTopic with Kafka version prior 2.4.0.

    Replace import of org.apache.kafka.streams.TopologyTestDriver with this class to use new functionality.

    To migrate to Kafka version 2.4.0 replace import of com.github.jukkakarvanen.kafka.streams.test with org.apache.kafka.streams or org.apache.kafka.streams.test

    See Also:
    TestInputTopic, TestOutputTopic, TestRecord

      • advanceWallClockTime

        public void advanceWallClockTime(java.time.Duration advance)
        Advances the internally mocked wall-clock time. This might trigger a wall-clock type punctuations.
        Parameters:
        advance - the amount of time to advance wall-clock time
